      public int updateOneComment(int com_id, String content)
      update a specific comment
      Parameters:
      com_id - The comment id of the row need to be updated
      content - the new content of the comment
      Returns:
      The number of like count of the row. -1 indicates an error.

    • insertOneComment

      public int insertOneComment(int id, String user_id, String content)
      insert a new comment to table
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the related idea
      user_id - the user id of the related user
      content - the content of the comment
      Returns:
      The number of rows inserted to the comment table.
